title: Udi's Pizza Cafe Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A bread company that also operates cafes in Colorado. This one is attached to the Tattered Cover Bookstore and offers pizza and sandwiches. Veg and veg optional items are marked on the menu. Staff is knowledgeable about different dietary needs. Sandwiches can be made with Udi's gluten-free bread.
